data.name: DIT-Forms
data.description: üåÄ DIT is a web based application that serves the purpose to aid in the Disassembly and Inspection process of the drilling equipment for overhaul and repair both in offline and online mode. DIT has Digital Forms equivalent to the templates in ePIMS system used for inspections globally.

data.name: Avitas
data.description: üöÄ  Avitas strives to revolutionize the oil & gas, and power industries by offering innovative solutions. Leveraging predictive data analytics, robotics, and artificial intelligence, Avitas provides advanced capabilities to enhance operations. With a focus on both underwater (Terrain) and terrestrial (Sky) examinations, Avitas employs drones to capture images and detect leaks. Immediately alerts are generated for the responsible personnel whenever leaks are identified, enabling prompt inspections and necessary actions. Avitas aims to deliver comprehensive and efficient solutions to ensure safety and optimize performance in these industries.

data.name: GHEM
data.description: üöÄ The Greenhouse Emission Management (GHEM) system is designed to help energy industry players monitor their emissions in a more efficient and effective manner. The system enables the measurement, monitoring, and reporting of greenhouse gas emissions across various sources in the energy industry.
